tool.name: cpt_fasta_regex_search.py
tool.description: Filter sequences based on regular expressions
tool.help:
**What it does**
Filter FASTA Sequences with regular expressions.
For example to find a sequence with a Cysteine residue within the first 30 amino acids, you might use the following: ``.{0,29}C``, which says 0-29 of ANY character, then a C. For help with advanced queries, please talk to your friendly bioinformatician.
